verses.verse: And <WG2532> it came to pass <WG1096>, when <WG3753> Jesus <WG2424> had made an end <WG5055> of commanding <WG1299> his <WG846> twelve <WG1427> disciples <WG3101>, he departed <WG3327> thence <WG1564> to teach <WG1321> and <WG2532> to preach <WG2784> in <WG1722> their <WG846> cities <WG4172>.
Now <WG1161> when John <WG2491> had heard <WG191> in <WG1722> the prison <WG1201> the works <WG2041> of Christ <WG5547>, he sent <WG3992> two <WG1417> of his <WG846> disciples <WG3101>,
And said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Art <WG1488> thou <WG4771> he that should come <WG2064>, or <WG2228> do we look <WG4328> for another <WG2087>?

Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>, Go <WG4198> and shew <WG518> John <WG2491> again <WG518> those things which <WG3739> ye do hear <WG191> and <WG2532> see <WG991> :

The blind <WG5185> receive their sight <WG308> , and <WG2532> the lame <WG5560> walk <WG4043> , the lepers <WG3015> are cleansed <WG2511> , and <WG2532> the deaf <WG2974> hear <WG191> , the dead <WG3498> are raised up <WG1453> , and <WG2532> the poor <WG4434> have the gospel preached to them <WG2097> .
And <WG2532> blessed <WG3107> is <WG2076> he , whosoever <WG3739> shall <WG4624> not <WG3362> be offended <WG4624> in <WG1722> me <WG1698> .

¶ And <WG1161> as <WG5130> they departed <WG4198>, Jesus <WG2424> began <WG756> to say <WG3004> unto the multitudes <WG3793> concerning <WG4012> John <WG2491>, What <WG5101> went ye <WG1831> out into <WG1519> the wilderness <WG2048> to see <WG2300> ? A reed <WG2563> shaken <WG4531> with <WG5259> the wind <WG417> ?

But <WG235> what <WG5101> went ye out <WG1831> for to see <WG1492> ? A man <WG444> clothed <WG294> in <WG1722> soft <WG3120> raiment <WG2440> ? behold <WG2400> , they that wear <WG5409> soft <WG3120> clothing are <WG1526> in <WG1722> kings' <WG935> houses <WG3624> .
But <WG235> what <WG5101> went ye out <WG1831> for to see <WG1492> ? A prophet <WG4396> ? yea <WG3483> , I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213> , and <WG2532> more <WG4055> than a prophet <WG4396> .

For <WG1063> this <WG3778> is <WG2076> he , of <WG4012> whom <WG3739> it is written <WG1125> , Behold <WG2400> , I <WG1473> send <WG649> my <WG3450> messenger <WG32> before <WG4253> thy <WG4675> face <WG4383> , which <WG3739> shall prepare <WG2680> thy <WG4675> way <WG3598> before <WG1715> thee <WG4675> .

Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213> , Among <WG1722> them that are born <WG1084> of women <WG1135> there hath <WG1453> not <WG3756> risen <WG1453> a greater than <WG3187> John <WG2491> the Baptist <WG910> : notwithstanding <WG1161> he that is least <WG3398> in <WG1722> the kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> is <WG2076> greater than <WG3187> he <WG846> .

And <WG1161> from <WG575> the days <WG2250> of John <WG2491> the Baptist <WG910> until <WG2193> now <WG737> the kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> suffereth violence <WG971> , and <WG2532> the violent <WG973> take <WG726> it <WG846> by force <WG726> .
For <WG1063> all <WG3956> the prophets <WG4396> and <WG2532> the law <WG3551> prophesied <WG4395> until <WG2193> John <WG2491> .
And <WG2532> if <WG1487> ye will <WG2309> receive <WG1209> it , this <WG846> is <WG2076> Elias <WG2243> , which <WG3588> was for <WG3195> to come <WG2064> .
He that hath <WG2192> ears <WG3775> to hear <WG191> , let him hear <WG191> .

¶ But <WG1161> whereunto <WG5101> shall I liken <WG3666> this <WG5026> generation <WG1074> ? It is <WG2076> like <WG3664> unto children <WG3808> sitting <WG2521> in <WG1722> the markets <WG58> , and <WG2532> calling <WG4377> unto their <WG846> fellows <WG2083> ,

And <WG2532> saying <WG3004> , We have piped <WG832> unto you <WG5213> , and <WG2532> ye have <WG3738> not <WG3756> danced <WG3738> ; we have mourned <WG2354> unto you <WG5213> , and <WG2532> ye have <WG2875> not <WG3756> lamented <WG2875> .
For <WG1063> John <WG2491> came <WG2064> neither <WG3383> eating <WG2068> nor <WG3383> drinking <WG4095> , and <WG2532> they say <WG3004> , He hath <WG2192> a devil <WG1140> .

The Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> came <WG2064> eating <WG2068> and <WG2532> drinking <WG4095> , and <WG2532> they say <WG3004> , Behold <WG2400> a man <WG444> gluttonous <WG5314> , and <WG2532> a winebibber <WG3630> , a friend <WG5384> of publicans <WG5057> and <WG2532> sinners <WG268> . But <WG2532> wisdom <WG4678> is justified <WG1344> of <WG575> her <WG846> children <WG5043> .

¶ Then <WG5119> began he <WG756> to upbraid <WG3679> the cities <WG4172> wherein <WG1722> <WG3739> most <WG4118> of his <WG846> mighty works <WG1411> were done <WG1096>, because <WG3754> they repented <WG3340> not <WG3756>:

Woe <WG3759> unto thee <WG4671> , Chorazin <WG5523> ! woe <WG3759> unto thee <WG4671> , Bethsaida <WG966> ! for <WG3754> if <WG1487> the mighty works <WG1411> , which <WG3588> were done <WG1096> in <WG1722> you <WG5213> , had been done <WG1096> in <WG1722> Tyre <WG5184> and <WG2532> Sidon <WG4605> , they would have repented <WG3340> long ago <WG302> <WG3819> in <WG1722> sackcloth <WG4526> and <WG2532> ashes <WG4700> .

But <WG4133> I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213> , It shall be <WG2071> more tolerable <WG414> for Tyre <WG5184> and <WG2532> Sidon <WG4605> at <WG1722> the day <WG2250> of judgment <WG2920> , than <WG2228> for you <WG5213> .

And <WG2532> thou <WG4771> , Capernaum <WG2584> , which <WG3588> art exalted <WG5312> unto <WG2193> heaven <WG3772> , shalt be brought down <WG2601> to <WG2193> hell <WG86> : for <WG3754> if <WG1487> the mighty works <WG1411> , which <WG3588> have been done <WG1096> in <WG1722> thee <WG4671> , had been done <WG1096> in <WG1722> Sodom <WG4670> , it would have remained <WG302> <WG3306> until <WG3360> this day <WG4594> .

But <WG4133> I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213> , That <WG3754> it shall be <WG2071> more tolerable <WG414> for the land <WG1093> of Sodom <WG4670> in <WG1722> the day <WG2250> of judgment <WG2920> , than <WG2228> for thee <WG4671> .

¶ At <WG1722> that <WG1565> time <WG2540> Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and said <WG2036>, I thank <WG1843> thee <WG4671> , O Father <WG3962> , Lord <WG2962> of heaven <WG3772> and <WG2532> earth <WG1093> , because <WG3754> thou hast hid <WG613> these things <WG5023> from <WG575> the wise <WG4680> and <WG2532> prudent <WG4908> , and <WG2532> hast revealed <WG601> them <WG846> unto babes <WG3516> .
Even so <WG3483> , Father <WG3962> : for <WG3754> so <WG3779> it seemed <WG1096> good <WG2107> in thy <WG4675> sight <WG1715> .

All things <WG3956> are delivered <WG3860> unto me <WG3427> of <WG5259> my <WG3450> Father <WG3962> : and <WG2532> no man <WG3762> knoweth <WG1921> the Son <WG5207> , but <WG1508> the Father <WG3962> ; neither <WG3761> knoweth <WG1921> any man <WG5100> the Father <WG3962> , save <WG1508> the Son <WG5207> , and he <WG2532> to <WG3739> whomsoever <WG1437> the Son <WG5207> will <WG1014> reveal <WG601> him .
¶ Come <WG1205> unto <WG4314> me <WG3165> , all <WG3956> ye that labour <WG2872> and <WG2532> are heavy laden <WG5412> , and I <WG2504> will give <WG373> you <WG5209> rest <WG373> .

Take <WG142> my <WG3450> yoke <WG2218> upon <WG1909> you <WG5209> , and <WG2532> learn <WG3129> of <WG575> me <WG1700> ; for <WG3754> I am <WG1510> meek <WG4235> and <WG2532> lowly <WG5011> in heart <WG2588> : and <WG2532> ye shall find <WG2147> rest <WG372> unto your <WG5216> souls <WG5590> .
For <WG1063> my <WG3450> yoke <WG2218> is easy <WG5543> , and <WG2532> my <WG3450> burden <WG5413> is <WG2076> light <WG1645> .
